getTTFCharacters

public VectorFontCharacter[] getTTFCharacters(processing.core.PApplet pa,
                                              java.lang.String text,
                                              org.mt4j.util.MTColor fillColor,
                                              java.lang.String fontFileName,
                                              int fontSize)
Gets the tTF characters.

Parameters:
pa - the pa
text - the text
fillColor - the fill color
strokeColor - the stroke color
fontFileName - the font file name
fontSize - the font size
Returns:
the tTF characters

getTTFCharacters

public VectorFontCharacter[] getTTFCharacters(processing.core.PApplet pa,
                                              java.lang.String text,
                                              org.mt4j.util.MTColor fillColor,
                                              java.lang.String fontFileName,
                                              int fontSize,
                                              boolean antiAliasing)
Gets the TTFont characters. This does essentially the same as createFont() but you can specify the characters to create in the string parameter.

Parameters:
pa - the pa
text - the text
fillColor - the fill color
strokeColor - the stroke color
fontFileName - the font file name
fontSize - the font size
antiAliasing - the anti aliasing
Returns:
the tTF characters

Parameters:
charCodeMapIndex - the char code map index
pa - the pa
fontFile - the font file
Returns:
the char charcode
